post.body: Careful now... Don't be hasty. ;)
don't think iPhone supports doc transfer that way... Can you bypass the wifi and just jack in?
Maslow rocks. ;)
yayyy! LOL
how was Mass?
Santa has a truly remarkable GPS system. That, and Rudolph of course. :)
Your mission, should you choose to accept it: Optimus Prime necktie. ;)
Why do you prefer Aperture to, say, Photoshop? What makes it different?
THANK YOU for the ScreenCastsOnline podcasts! I learned a TON!
iPhone, yo.
d00d. I hope you didn't sell the TX and the Stowaway...
Take notes. Someday, time will have passed and you will be responsible for traditions and celebrations in your own family. :)
Christmas can be problematic. We just celebrate it as family time, mostly. My family is fairly laissez faire, thank goodness.
County road commision recalls plows, gives up until 2am. View out my window: http://twitpic.com/v1nl
Attention sinuses: it is SO on now!! *goes to prepare netipot*
Waiting for the NEXT snowstorm. Supposed to get another foot of blowing snow tonight.
If the only reason you're on Twitter is because you're marketing something, I probably won't follow you back or use your product. Sorry.
remember: that which does not kill us... will double back and try again later.
...and now, sleep. Leftfield, take me to dreamland. ZZzzzzzz
Peace on Earth. Goodwill to all. Now: practice it. Kthx
